WorkItem.Description:
FYI:
 
I think there is a bug in the control template for DataGridCell.
It does not include template bindings for ContentPresenter.VerticalAlignment and ContentPresenter.HorizontalAlignment.
 
The has the effect that VeticalContentAlignment and HorizontalContentAlignment, when set on a DataGridCell style have no effect on how the cell's contents are laid out.
 
I think to fix this you need to modify DataGrid\Themes\Generic.xaml so that the content presenter inside the control template for  DataGridCell style looks like this:
 
<ContentPresenter SnapsToDevicePixels="{TemplateBinding SnapsToDevicePixels}" VerticalAlignment="{TemplateBinding VerticalContentAlignment}" HorizontalAlignment="{TemplateBinding HorizontalContentAlignment}"/>
 
instead of like this:
 
<ContentPresenter SnapsToDevicePixels="{TemplateBinding SnapsToDevicePixels}"/>

Comments.Message:
Hi scottwis,

We agree that this is a bug.  We are tracking this issue in our internal bug database and we will fix it in a future release.
